-| wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsc(s0, c4)
-| diffsc(s0, c3)

comment: The left inverse element of a group is unique. Lemma 2.2.1(b) of [Herstein] p. 55. (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-2011.)
